alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 10:31PM EST until January 02 at 11:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 1145 PM EST. * At 1031 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Quitman to 12 miles southeast of Monticello, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Naylor, Barretts, Twin Lakes, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Blue Springs, I-75 At Exit 22 and I-75 At Exit 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for south central Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
